title: The Common cold
creator_credit: Kelly Duncan, Canawest Films and Informedia Productions (US)
brief_description: Examines the worth or worthlessness of vaccines, antibiotics, vitamin C and other remedies for the common cold. Emphasises body resistance as the best protection. The structure and function of the virus which causes the cold is explained.
